name: MAHAMANAV GRAMIN VIKAS BAHUUDDESHIYA SANSTHA BERALA
briefDescription: MAHAMANAV GRAMIN VIKAS BAHUUDDESHIY SANSTHA IS THE PROVIDED EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS,SOCIAL WORK EDUCATION AND SOCIAL WORK EDUCATION LEARNING PROGRAMS, COMPUTER LITERACY PROGRAMS AND LEARNING OR TRAINING CENTERS (INSTITUTE).PERSONALITY DEVOLOPMENT, COMMUNICATION SKILL, STAGE DARING, PRESENTATION SKILL, WRITTING SKILL, READING TECHNICS, TEACHING SKILL, OFFICE MANAGEMENT, OFFICE AUTOMATION AND BOKKS KEEPING TECHNICSARE ALSO PROVIDED. IN THIS ORGANISATION ARE 7 PEOPLE (ENGINEERS) IS WORKED. A RURAL AND TRIBE AREAS.
